snippet: A new evaluation system can help improve a crucial program for children from poor families.
abstract: Editorial draws attention to new evaluating system to help improve Head Start program, which prepares disadvantaged 3- and 4-year-olds for school; warns that while the Obama administration is strengthening program's performance measures, its financing may be at risk; argues preschool for disadvantaged children should not be another casualty of the budget wars.
lead_paragraph: A new evaluation system can help improve a crucial program for children from poor families.
